message.content:
1. A two-arm, single-center, randomized, prospective study was performed.
2. The study involved 50 ENT surgical candidates.
3. An associated control group was also involved in the study.
4. The control group consisted of 50 individuals.
5. The participants were given an explanation of their anatomy.
6. The participants were given an explanation of their disease state.
7. The participants were given an explanation of their treatment options.
8. The education model was used as an aid in the study.

messages.content:
Statement: A two-arm, single-center, randomized, prospective study was then performed in which 50 ENT surgical candidates (and an associated control group, n = 50) were given an explanation of their anatomy, disease state, and treatment options using the education model as an aid.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
